csaPage.about: Community Supported Agriculute is a concept, which is among other things trying to connect a consumer directly with the producer (farmer). One method to achieve this, is to subscribe to boxes of products (shares). Most common is a weekly subscription with handover on agreed pickup point. In general the more boxes you prepay the lower the price per box.
